title: Layers of time in Utah
caption: Capitol Reef National Park, Utah, United States
copyright: Temple of the Sun, Capitol Reef National Park, Utah, USA (© Austin Cronnelly/TANDEM Stills + Motion)
description: Rock layers formed over millions of years and a massive bend in the Earth's crust give this desert a rare window into geologic history. This is Capitol Reef National Park in Utah, United States, where sandstone cliffs and canyons preserve a striking record of the planet's past. December 18 marks the anniversary of its designation as a national park in 1971. Today's featured image highlights the sandstone monoliths of Cathedral Valley, including the Temple of the Sun, part of this extraordinary, protected landscape.
